feed.title: Coral Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Coral: v9.6.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes and improvements

  • ensure SSO token URL updates from token https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4713
  • prevent refresh comments button from appearing on first load https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4715

entry.title: New release for Coral: v9.6.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes and improvements

  • surface SSO errors to user https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4720

entry.title: New release for Coral: v9.7.0
entry.content:
New and Updated Features

  • throw no username included error for sso with url for setting username by @kabeaty in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4723
  • add persistedQueries query to API by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4735
  • use published state when determining premod for new commenters by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4737

Bug fixes and improvements

  • optimize the account deletion process by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4726
  • update wording for media links configuration by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4725
  • Users with staff roles don't get repeat post check by @kabeaty in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4738
  • replace giphy/react-components with shared GifGrid for Giphy/Tenor by @kabeaty in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4731
  • encodes unicode chars for WebKit engines by @czepan in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4736
  • Remove experimental designations by @kabeaty in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4739

Full Changelog: https://github.com/coralproject/talk/compare/v9.6.2...v9.7.0

entry.title: New release for Coral: v9.8.0
entry.content:
New Features

  • [CORL-3213] premoderate and ban aliased email addresses under certain conditions by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4744

Full Changelog: https://github.com/coralproject/talk/compare/v9.7.0...v9.8.0

entry.title: New release for Coral: v9.9.0
entry.content:
New Features

  • [CORL-3221] Allow multiple profile linking for Coral auth (SSO/Local) + integration testing environment by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4747
  • [CORL-3221] Add an SSO token testing endpoint to Coral by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4755

Full Changelog: https://github.com/coralproject/talk/compare/v9.8.0...v9.9.0
